entry.title: Thursday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Temperature steady near plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries changing to 60 percent chance of flurries near noon. Fog patches dissipating early this morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning then light this afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 1. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 05 January 2023
